Language.name: en
Language.Text:
Got it?
Here.
I threw in probably 50 stones, but they just disappeared in the dark and that's it. It's gotta be crazy deep.
Start your stopwatch, I'm lighting it... Three, two, one, now!
Still falling ...
You see it?
No.
Nothing.

Upon every passing over Savepoint the level status is saved. When something goes wrong, then you can restart the level from the savepoint (this happens automatically if you select the level to play).
You can ignore the save and restart from the beginning: Restart Level button.
